gmOnly.name: GM Only
gmOnly.hint: If enabled, only the GM will be able to roll manually. When this setting is enabled, the module will be undetectable by players.

manualRollMode.name: Manual Roll Mode
manualRollMode.hint: If enabled, you will have to click the roll button to roll the dice. If disabled, the dice will roll automatically when you release them.

disableInCombat.name: Disable In Combat
disableInCombat.hint: If enabled, the module will be disabled during combat.

position.name: Position
position.hint: The position of the Real Dice window.

enableTotalBox.name: Enable Total Box
enableTotalBox.hint: If enabled, a box will be shown where you can enter the total of the roll. The module will then generate a roll that adds up to that total.

showMessage.name: Show Message
showMessage.hint: If enabled, a message will be shown in the chat to the GM when a player rolls manually.

messageColor.name: Message Color
messageColor.hint: The color of the message shown in the chat to the GM when a player rolls manually.

useTheme.name: Use Theme
useTheme.hint: If enabled, the Real Dice window will use a custom theme

themeColor.name: Theme Color
themeColor.hint: The accent color of the theme.

realDiceConfig.name: Dice Configuration
realDiceConfig.hint: Configure which dice should be rolled manually
realDiceConfig.label: Configure

real-roll.title: Real Dice
real-roll.totalBoxMessage: Enter the total of the roll instead of individual results.

tooltips.0: Manual Roll Mode: Disabled<hr> All rolls will be automatic.
tooltips.1: Manual Roll Mode: Enabled<hr> All rolls will be manual.
tooltips.2: Manual Roll Mode: Ask<hr> You will be asked if you want to roll manually or automatically.
